name: MrDunkin'sScienceTrivia
0:
”Alexa, launch Mr. Dunkin's Science Trivia”
”Alexa, open Mr. Dunkin's Science Trivia”
”Alexa, ask Mr. Dunkin's Science Trivia to play a game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mr. dunkin's science trivia
des:
Mr. Dunkin's Science trivia is a quiz game about general science terms, chemistry, and environmental science. 

You can challenge yourself or use Echo Buttons to buzz in up to four teams while you try to answer more science questions correctly than your opponents. (Echo Buttons are optional - you can play this game single player without needing any Echo Buttons.) 

Science trivia knowledge based on the first half of the year sixth-grade science vocabulary terms from Mr. Dunkin's class. Great for studying on your own before a test or for challenging the classroom to a trivia competition.

Logo designed by Freepik (free for commercial use with attribution).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
